title: SMC_GetMParameters (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_GetMParameters
If the interpolator is waiting for an M-function,
this function block can be used to query the parameters
that have been set for this M-function in the G-Code
(K, L, O words).

rows.Name: bEnable
rows.Comment: WhileTRUE, the function block is active

rows.Name: bMActive
rows.Comment:
The valueTRUEindicates a M-function is currently
active

rows:
M-parameters, specified by a variable of typeSMC_M_PARAMETERS(passed by the O-word).
Example G-Code: âN00 M5 K1 L2 O$mParams$â
